headline.print_headline: Foreign Branch Campuses Turn Attention to Local Culture and Programs
headline.main: Foreign Branch Campuses Turn Attention to Local Culture and Programs

docs.snippet: Academics and students at a conference in Kuala Lumpur said Western universities should emphasize the unique benefits of branch campuses rather than simply trying to replicate their main campuses....
docs.lead_paragraph: Academics and students at a conference in Kuala Lumpur said Western universities should emphasize the unique benefits of branch campuses rather than simply trying to replicate their main campuses.

headline.print_headline: Taking Big-City Skills to Indonesia's Villages

docs.snippet: MEYERS--Joan Silverstein, 68. Wife and best friend to Leon. Mother to Bill and Kori, Sara and Kenny, Rebecca and Michael. She leaves behind nine grandchildren, countless friends and admirers. Shiva is being held at the Meyers' residence through Ma...
docs.lead_paragraph: MEYERS--Joan Silverstein, 68. Wife and best friend to Leon. Mother to Bill and Kori, Sara and Kenny, Rebecca and Michael. She leaves behind nine grandchildren, countless friends and admirers. Shiva is being held at the Meyers' residence through May 4.

docs.snippet: CLYMAN--Dr. Daniel, 86, of Mt. Kisco NY, died on April 28, 2012. Born February 27, 1926 in Baltimore, MD, he served in the US Navy in WW II and graduated from the University of MD Medical School in 1952. A devoted physician, Dr. Clyman dedicated h...
docs.lead_paragraph: CLYMAN--Dr. Daniel, 86, of Mt. Kisco NY, died on April 28, 2012. Born February 27, 1926 in Baltimore, MD, he served in the US Navy in WW II and graduated from the University of MD Medical School in 1952. A devoted physician, Dr. Clyman dedicated his life to medicine and cared deeply for his many patients. He was founder of the Mt. Pleasant Medical Group, on staff at White Plains Hospital and former Chief of Staff at St. Agnes Hospital. He is survived by his wife, Myrna Kessler Clyman, daughter Karen Robin, son Mark Clyman, daughter in law Millie, granddaughter Madi Wood, brother and sister in-law Sidney and Bernice Clyman, and sister-in-law and bother-in-law Sunny and Michael Halperin. Services will be held at 1:30pm on Tuesday, May 1st at Temple Beth El of Northern Westchester in Chappaqua, NY. Donations may be made in his honor to the Daniel Clyman Memorial Scholarship at Westchester County Community College, The Katonah Museum of Art and VNA and Hospice Care Foundation of Hudson Valley.

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  O'BRIEN, G. FRANK

docs.snippet: O'BRIEN--G. Frank, of New York, NY, aged 73, passed away in Goshen, NY, April 25. Survived by brothers Edward Charles O'Brien and Daniel Rea O'Brien, several nieces and nephews. Frank was a retired File Clerk for CBS Law Dept. New York, NY. Funera...
docs.lead_paragraph: O'BRIEN--G. Frank, of New York, NY, aged 73, passed away in Goshen, NY, April 25. Survived by brothers Edward Charles O'Brien and Daniel Rea O'Brien, several nieces and nephews. Frank was a retired File Clerk for CBS Law Dept. New York, NY. Funeral mass 10am Wednesday, May 2 at St. John The Evangelist Church, Goshen, NY. Donations to: www.hospiceoforange.com. Services by Smith, Seaman & Quackenbush, Monroe, NY.

docs.snippet: NEWMAN--Daniel. It is 10 years to the day that we lost you, Dad. We miss you still -- and fiercely. Jeff and Charles and their families...
docs.lead_paragraph: NEWMAN--Daniel. It is 10 years to the day that we lost you, Dad. We miss you still -- and fiercely. Jeff and Charles and their families

docs.snippet: FLUMENBAUM--Libby. The partners, counsel, associates and staff of the firm of Paul, Weiss, Rifkind, Wharton & Garrison LLP express profound sorrow at the death on Friday, April 27 of Libby Flumenbaum, beloved mother of our friend and partner Marti...
docs.lead_paragraph: FLUMENBAUM--Libby. The partners, counsel, associates and staff of the firm of Paul, Weiss, Rifkind, Wharton & Garrison LLP express profound sorrow at the death on Friday, April 27 of Libby Flumenbaum, beloved mother of our friend and partner Martin Flumenbaum. We express our deepest sympathies to Marty and to all other members of the family.

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WILLIAMSON, BENJAMIN R.

docs.snippet: WILLIAMSON--Benjamin Robert, Jr. The Board of Trustees of The North Carolina Society of New York express our deepest sympathy to the family of Benjamin Robert Williamson, Jr. Robert was our esteemed former president of the Society and dear friend....
docs.lead_paragraph: WILLIAMSON--Benjamin Robert, Jr. The Board of Trustees of The North Carolina Society of New York express our deepest sympathy to the family of Benjamin Robert Williamson, Jr. Robert was our esteemed former president of the Society and dear friend. We will deeply miss his fun-loving passion for life and his dedication to the Society.

docs.snippet: LAST--Judith, died April 26, 2012. We all mourn for the loss of our dear sister, aunt and friend extraordinaire....
docs.lead_paragraph: LAST--Judith, died April 26, 2012. We all mourn for the loss of our dear sister, aunt and friend extraordinaire.
